description: Excessive garbage collection causing performance degradation. App spends more time in GC than executing code.
solutions: Use StringBuilder instead of string concatenation
Use primitive arrays instead of collections
Increase heap size only if absolutely necessary
prevention: Monitor GC frequency with Android Profiler
Use primitive types instead of wrapper classes
Avoid allocations in loops and draw methods
examples: val builder = StringBuilder(); for (s in strings) builder.append(s)
val array = IntArray(size) // Instead of Array<Int>
// Avoid: for (i in 0..1000) { val obj = TempObject() } // Creates 1000 objects
